item.description:
Anyone up for a healthy, tasty and fun lunch? This Saturday's weather will be perfect for this kind meal. Aftereward, we are going to play some pools around the area. If you like to join us for pool only, please make a note in your RSVP.

the cost for hot pot is about $15-20 per person...depends on what kind of soup or food you pick. For more information, please go to www.littlequsa.com

For those of you don't drive, you can take the Red Line T to Quincy Center Station, it is about 10 minutes walk from the T station. If you need to pick up from the T Station, please let us ahead of time. Or if anyone can give someone a ride, please make a note in your RSVP. thanks.

For those of you drive, there are plenty street parkings or you can park in the parking lot in the back.

please send me an email if you have any questions.

Susan

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Hot Pot Lunch
